name: Straw-Bebe
description:
Help Catter eat and grow strawberries by navigating through each level's tight spaces and tricky jumps.

Controls
  • Left/Right: Move
  • Up/Down: Change Shape
  • Jump
    • X on Keyboard
    • A on Controller
  • Chrysalis
    • Z on Keyboard
    • X on Controller
  • Restart
    • R on Keyboard
    • Select on Controller
Credits
  • Song: https://opengameart.org/content/nintendo-style-quirky-music-loop-01
  • Art: Hiraeth_Awaits
  • Programming: Clang
